title: Rhombitetrahexagonal tiling
summary: In geometry, the rhombitetrahexagonal tiling is a uniform tiling of the hyperbolic plane. It has Schl√§fli symbol of rr{6,4}. It can be seen as constructed as a rectified tetrahexagonal tiling, r{6,4}, as well as an expanded order-4 hexagonal tiling or expanded order-6 square tiling.
